      • setAnimation

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Animation<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion> setAnimation(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[] frames,

                                                                                                                float frameDuration)
        Used to set the animation based on a TextureRegion array
        Parameters:
        frames - array that contains the animation frames
        animation - the animation made in this method
        frameDuration - used to determine the duration of a single frame (the speed of the animation)
        Returns:
        returns the animation made from the frames
